name: Buck Is Missing
description:
Follow in the footsteps of the famous missing person case of Buck the deer who has magically disappear without a trace. The only known people to have seen him was  Charles the cat, Becky the goose and Bill the bull well known friends and close partners to Buck. But problems start happening when,Bill hasn't shown up.

Could something be going on that he knows?

What will you do detective will you find Buck with your trusty partner Shadow or will you fail in the end?.

Controls- The arrow keys to move and B for the flashlight in level 4.
